issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Types
components.description: Issues related to Hive Query Languages type system

fields.description: Hive doesn't allow binary comparison between doubles and bigints. That is overly restrictive since all other DBs (mysql, postgres, oracle and sql server) allows that.
fields.summary: Allow comparisons between doubles and bigints
